ModMetaData.name: Custom Climate Cycle
ModMetaData.author: dninemfive
ModMetaData.description: Adds a new climate cycle setting allowing customization of every aspect, from period to temperature offsets, plus the ability to set up a runaway scenario. Access it through the new "Custom Climate Cycle" scenario part.\n\nThanks to 22点下 for the Chinese (Simplified and Traditional) translations.
